com.example.sextoncalculator
Class BrowseActivity

java.lang.Object
  ListActivity
      com.example.sextoncalculator.BrowseActivity

public class BrowseActivity
extends ListActivity

BrowseActivity creates interface to browse all food items available. Total price is calculated when adding and removing food items to/from shopping cart.

Author:
Johnathan Ly, Adam Bachmeier, Tsuehue Xiong, Justin Springer

Method Detail

onCreate

public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
Called when interface is created. Sets up list view to display food item information. Sets up click listener for buttons.

Returns:

restartActivity

public void restartActivity()
Resets display to default interface prior to selections.

increaseQuantity

public void increaseQuantity(View v)
Increases selected food item quantity by one. Adds selected food item to shopping cart or updates quantity if food item already exists.

Parameters:
v - the view being used

decreaseQuantity

public void decreaseQuantity(View v)
Decreases selected food item quantity by one. Updates quantity of food item in shopping cart or removes food item when quantity reaches zero after change.

Parameters:
v - the view being used
